dialog.msg:
Choose a name that will be used in transactions

Your name will be seen in invoices to those who pay you as well as people you pay to.

saveGeolocation.title: Save geolocation of transaction
saveGeolocation.subtitle: Locally save the location of a transaction

remove.title: Remove mnemonic from device
remove.subtitle: Permanently remove the seed from this device

dialog.title: Remove seed
dialog.msg: This will permanently remove the seed from this device. Only do this if you have backed up your seed!

googleCloud.title: Google Drive channel backup
googleCloud.subtitle: Automatically backup channels to Google Drive

googleCloudForce.title: Manually trigger Google Drive Backup
googleCloudForce.alert: Backed up channels to Google Drive

dialog.title: Not recommended
dialog.msg:
Warning. It is not recommended to disable scheduled chain sync.

Make sure you keep up-to-date with the network otherwise you risk losing your funds.

Only do this if you're know what you're doing.

node.title: Bitcoin Node
node.subtitle: Set Bitcoin node (BIP157) to connect to

restoreDialog.title: Restore node
restoreDialog.msg: Would you like to restore to the default node

restartDialog.title: Restart required
restartDialog.msg: Blixt Wallet has to be restarted before the new configuration is applied.
restartDialog.msg1: Would you like to do that now?

zmqRawBlock.title: Set bitcoind ZMQ Raw Block Host

zmqRawTx.title: Set bitcoind ZMQ Raw Tx Host

inbound.title: Inbound channel services
inbound.subtitle: Use an inbound channel service for receiving payments

dialog.title: Incoming channel provider
dialog.msg1: Choose an incoming channel provider and press Continue.
dialog.msg2: Your web browser will be opened to the corresponding provider's website, where you will be able to request a channel.
dialog.msg3: When you're done, you can copy the address code and/or open the link using Blixt Wallet.

restoreDialog.title: Restore Dunder Server
restoreDialog.msg: Would you like to restore to the default Dunder server

graphSync.title: Wait for graph sync before paying
graphSync.subtitle: Synchronized graph leads to optimal payment paths

appLog.title: Copy app log to local storage

lndLog.title: Copy lnd log to local storage
lndLog.subtitle: Reached from /sdcard/BlixtWallet

LSP.title: Enable Dunder LSP
LSP.subtitle: HIGHLY EXPERIMENTAL. Lightning Service Provider that helps with inbound liquidity

MPP.title: Enable Multi-Path Payments
MPP.subtitle: Payments can take up to 2 paths

enabled.title: Restart app and enable Tor
enabled.msg1: Enabling Tor will make the wallet connect to its peers (both Bitcoin and Lightning Network peers) via the Tor Network.
enabled.msg2: You'll also be able to connect and open channels to Lightning nodes that uses onion services.
enabled.msg3: WARNING: Blixt Wallet will still talk to the following services without Tor
enabled.msg5: Reason: To get the current block height
enabled.msg8: WebLN Browser and LNURL will also not use Tor.

disabled.title: Restart app and disable Tor
disabled.msg1: Disabling Tor requires an app restart.

onion.title: Show Tor onion service
onion.subtitle: For connecting and opening channels to this wallet

demo.title: Activate Demo Mode
demo.subtitle: Used for promo. Restart app to reset
